overview: The bitter film grotesque focuses on a Socialist Mafioso. V치g칩, the enthusiastic young propagandist is put up at Apuka (Daddy) of the outskirts, D치vid. In the hands of Apuka everything becomes money and he skilfully avoids inspection and controls. In order to help his little family, he sells his rabbit husbandry as mutton, he practises usury on and blackmails his tenants, their rooms are operated as cigar stores.
title: Rabbits in the Cloak-Room
